insurance.label: Insurance Lead Generation

icp.description: Insurance agencies and call centers buying exclusive or semi-exclusive leads
icp.decision_maker: Agency owner, VP Sales, Call Center Manager

insurance.value_proposition: AI-qualified insurance leads with real-time intent scoring, compliance pre-screening, and buyer-matched routing that reduces CPA by 30%+

legal.label: Legal Lead Generation

icp.description: Law firms and legal intake centers seeking case-qualified leads
icp.decision_maker: Managing Partner, Director of Intake, Marketing Director

legal.value_proposition: Case-qualified legal leads with AI intake pre-screening, real-time case value estimation, and geo-targeted delivery matching case type to firm specialty

home_services.label: Home Services Lead Generation

icp.description: Home services companies and franchise groups buying exclusive local leads

home_services.value_proposition: Exclusive, territory-locked home services leads with real-time availability matching, AI qualification, and automated appointment setting

funding.label: Business Funding

icp.description: Small-medium businesses seeking working capital or growth funding

funding.value_proposition: AI-powered business funding matchmaking with instant pre-qualification, multi-lender comparison, and compliance-first approach that closes deals 3x faster

cre.label: Commercial Real Estate

icp.description: CRE investors, developers, and brokers seeking deal flow and market intelligence

cre.value_proposition: AI-driven CRE deal flow with automated market analysis, comp research, and underwriting support that cuts due diligence time by 50%
